author: luc
msg: The sparse vector and matrix classes have been un-deprecated.
This is a reversal of a former decision, as we now think we should adopt
a generally accepted behavior which is ... to ignore the problems of
NaNs and infinities in sparse linear algebra entities.
JIRA: MATH-870 (which is therefore NOT fixed)

author: mbenson
msg: [COMMONSSITE-78] Item #2: The left-hand side menu is centered vertically which makes it somehow invisible. The user has to scroll down on larger pages such as the above mentioned start page.
